extName.description: The extension name may translate easily from 'Color Pick Eyedropper' however it is preferred to leave it english unless your locale has a matching translation for eyedropper, color, and pick.  If you can omit the space between Color and Pick in your language then please do so.  Eyedropper referrs to what the tool would be called in image editing software such as photoshop in your locale.  Definitions follow: color - the property possessed by an object of producing different sensations on the eye as a result of the way the object reflects or emits light.  pick -  choose (someone or something) from a number of alternatives, typically after careful thought.  eyedropper - a short glass tube with a rubber bulb at one end and a tiny hole at the other, for measuring out drops of medicine or other liquids, (also eyedropper tool) (in image-editing software) a function enabling the user to copy color from any part of an image.

extDescription.message: A zoomed eyedropper & color chooser tool that allows you to select color values from webpages and more.

closeAndExit.message: Close and Exit Color Pick Mode

hideMinimize.description: This will hide the extension's popup menu triggered when clicking the extension icon, the [esc] key does this too.

buyRegisterTip.message: Click to Buy & Register a ColorPick License.
buyRegisterTip.description: 'ColorPick' refers to the extName key, see that description for details, if that key is not translated leave this part of the string untranslated

registerBannerLong.description: 'ColorPick' refers to the extName key, see that description for details, if that key is not translated leave this part of the string untranslated

pickAgainLocked.description: Pick Another Color, the [Enter] keyboard key does this too.

pickAgainUnlocked.description: Select Current Color, the [Enter] keyboard key does this too.

disablePickEveryTime.message: Do not start picking each time popup is clicked
disablePickEveryTime.description: 'start picking' in this usage refers to entering color selection mode.  By default the mode will be retained instead (locked (selected) or unlocked (picking)).  'popup' refers to the extension's popup menu triggered when clicking the icon.

reSnapPage.description: Take a new snapshot for colors, the [r] keyboard key does this too.

getStandaloneApp.description: 'ColorPick' refers to the extName key, see that description for details, if that key is not translated leave this part of the string untranslated

bgPageUnavailable.message: Background Snapshot Not Responding - Please Refresh the Page and Try Again.

licenseExceeded.message: License may be in use on the maximum number of hosts.  License upgrade may resolve the issue... Launch upgrade webpage?

licenseComFirewall.message: Make sure your firewall is open on port 80 or contact your system administrator.

showndefaults.message: Please press save, now showing defaults.

loadsyncOptions.message: Sync Storage options have been loaded and saved.

pickEveryTime.message: Start picking colors each time popup is clicked
pickEveryTime.description: 'Start picking' in this usage refers to entering color selection mode.  If this feature is disabled the previous mode will be retained instead (locked (selected) or unlocked (picking)).  'popup' refers to the extension's popup menu triggered when clicking the icon.

allowWebGl.description: The technology known as 'WebGL' is used for zoomed preview, see https://get.webgl.org/

EnableRGB.description: 'RGB' refers to the red-green-blue color format

EnableHSL.description: 'HSL' refers to the hue-saturation-lightness color format

showPreviewInContent.message: Show zoom preview near cursor while picking
showPreviewInContent.description: 'picking' in this usage refers to being in color selection mode.

ShowRGBHSL.message: Also show Hex, RGB and/or HSL (configure above)
ShowRGBHSL.description: 'RGB' refers to the red-green-blue color format, 'HSL' refers to the hue-saturation-lightness color format 'Hex' refers to the hexadecimal color format

autocopyhex.message: Attempt to auto copy value to clipboard

hasAgreedToLicense.message: Has agreed to Terms of Use

selectWithExt.description: 'ColorPick Eyedropper' refers to the extName key, see that description for details, if that key is not translated leave this part of the string untranslated

usageStatistics.message: Gather Usage Statistics (See Terms of Use)

shareClors.message: Color of the Day Statistics (See Terms of Use)

usePNG.description: 'PNG' refers to web technology for image encoding

supportColorInputs.message: Add ColorPick Eyedropper near input[type=color] fields on websites
supportColorInputs.description: 'ColorPick Eyedropper' refers to the extName key, see that description for details.  'input[type=color]' is an html query selector literal known to developers and should remain intact

useCSSValues.description: 'CSS' refers to web technology, 'RGB' refers to the red-green-blue color format, 'HSL' refers to the hue-saturation-lightness color format

CSS3ColorFormat.description: 'CSS' refers to web technology, the eg: (#1,#2,#3) refers to an example default value for the field which is literally '(#1,#2,#3)'

iconIsPreview.message: Use icon badge square color preview

appleIcon.message: Use Apple Digital Color Meter logo
appleIcon.description: 'Apple' refers to the company, 'Digital Color Meter' refers to a program included on MacOS and developed by Apple. This is for people who do not like the default logo.

showPreviousClr.message: Show Split Color Preview with Previous Color

hideWatermark.message: Hide ColorPick watermark on webpage corner (registered only)
hideWatermark.description: 'ColorPick' refers to the extName key, see that description for details, if that key is not translated leave this part of the string untranslated

fetchSync.message: Fetch settings from Google Account Sync Storage
fetchSync.description: 'Google' refers to the company, 'Account Sync Storage' refers to the ability to synchronize sittings across devices.  This feature pulls the setting stored to the account for display.

desktopapp.description: 'ColorPick' refers to the extName key, see that description for details, if that key is not translated leave this part of the string untranslated

mobileapp.description: 'ColorPick' refers to the extName key, see that description for details, if that key is not translated leave this part of the string untranslated

noSwatches.message: Click colors in color history to add them to a palette for saving and printing.

watermark_help.message: Watermark may be disabled from advanced options once you have registered the extension.

tips_0.message: Register ColorPick for the option to hide this message.
tips_0.description: 'ColorPick' refers to the extName key, see that description for details, if that key is not translated leave this part of the string untranslated

tips_1.message: Move your mouse over the web page to examine pixel color values. Click to the web page to pick!
tips_1.description: 'pick' refers to selection of the current color, or the user has chosen the current color.

tips_1_locked.message: Click the web page to unlock and examine color values again.

tips_2.message: Return to the ColorPick menu for fine adjustment options, history or to exit ColorPick.
tips_2.description: 'ColorPick' refers to the extName key, see that description for details, if that key is not translated leave this part of the string untranslated

reloadRequired.message: Sorry - the page must be reloaded for this feature of the ColorPick extension to work. This can occcur when the extension updates or is reloaded.
